Name: Syrtis Fusiliers
Details: The Fusiliers Brigade originated as the private army of the Hasek family, with its beginnings in the ad hoc force drawn from workers in the various mining and drilling operations owned by the Hasek family during the early history of New Syrtis. The Syrtis Fusiliers grew from being personal guards to the Hasek family to becoming the official guard of New Syrtis and one of the most important military forces within the Capellan March.
